vendor_name: Holiday Inn Johor Bahru City Centre
title: Malaysia: Contemporary Johor Bahru City Escape with Rooftop Pool
description: A decidedly contemporary stay with signature comforts, Holiday Inn Johor Bahru City Centre, an IHG hotel, makes for an idyllic Malaysian escape. The hotel is the perfect launchpad for lovers of ancient architecture and fun-seekers alike, rubbing shoulders with both age-old temples and the more modern constructions of Legoland Malaysia. Although with sprawling city views from the rooftop pool and plenty of quality food and drink options onsite, you might feel tempted to stay in this spot all day.
location_description: Holiday Inn Johor Bahru City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Jalan Tun Abdul Razak, Johor Bahru, Malaysia 8000
